text: Alexa may refer to: == Technology == *Amazon Alexa, a virtual assistant developed by Amazon * Alexa Internet, a subsidiary of Amazon.com that provides web traffic analysis * Arri Alexa, a digital motion picture camera == People == *Alexa (name), a given name and surname *AleXa, American pop singer based in South Korea == Other uses == * Alexa (plant), a genus of legumes * Alexa (typeface), a typeface * 2013 Middle East cold snap, also referred to as Alexa * One Night's Intoxication, a 1951 German film released in Austria as Alexa
title: Alexa
